response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 by you, and I am confident it will be a valuable asset to your company.

To make this proposition even more attractive, I am offering you the chance to secure this product at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage in the market while ensuring you receive the best possible return on investment.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a strategic move that could propel your business forward. Should you decide to proceed, I am here to facilitate the transaction and answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
